question: The National Farmers Day is celebrated in honour of which Indian Prime Minister?
explanation: The National Farmers Day or Kisan Diwas is celebrated on 23<sup>rd</sup> of December in honor of ex-Prime Minister Chaudhary Charan Singh. He was the 5<sup>th</sup> PM of India. He is noted for his championship of peasants’ causes and his memorial is known as ‘Kisan Ghat’.
